arguments.title: New Sanction on High‑Risk Country X Detected
arguments.body:
## Summary
A new sanction effective 2025‑04‑01 targets Country X with travel bans and asset freezes. This aligns with your internal control **HC‑001** (Transactions with Country X are prohibited).

## Action
No immediate policy change required. Continue monitoring.

*Record ID:* REG‑2025‑01

messages.content: Summary: A new sanction was issued against Country X effective 2025‑04‑01. This reinforces your existing control HC‑001 which already restricts dealings with Country X.
Alert dispatched via Slack to @compliance_lead and compliance@company.com.
